We import and prepare for the analysis of the Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS) analysis.

We first review the most recent data sets and dictionaries availale (2023) [here](https://nces.ed.gov/ipeds/datacenter/DataFiles.aspx?gotoReportId=7&fromIpeds=true&sid=dd2935f1-8689-48b6-8762-f2258855e466&rtid=1). We also explore some potential options for future analysis.
